sources.title: Slap Happy Hunters (1941)
sources.description: Gandy Goose and his bullying, tormentor Cat buddy, are hunting in the jungle. The jungle birds and animals are irritated at being hunted (especially by an American goose and alley-cat), hold a counsel and devise ways and means to harass the unwelcome invaders. Gandy and Cat put up an inept fight and driven away. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/slap-happy-hunters-1941/

metadata.Plot: Gandy Goose and his bullying, tormentor Cat buddy, are hunting in the jungle. The jungle birds and animals are irritated at being hunted (especially by an American goose and alley-cat), hold a counsel and devise ways and means to harass the unwelcome invaders. Gandy and Cat put up an inept fight and driven away.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Isadore Klein, Tom Morrison
